channel.title: Microsoft NET on Metricly Docs

item.title: Metrics
item.description: Friendly Name FQN Description Exceptions Thrown/sec CLR_count_exceptions_thrown The number of exceptions thrown per second. This includes both .NET exceptions and unmanaged exceptions that are converted into .NET exceptions. % Time in Garbage Collection CLR_percent_time_in_GC The percentage of elapsed time spent performing garbage collection since the last garbage collection cycle. Application Restarts ASP_application_restarts The number of times an application has been restarted during the serverâ€™s lifetime.
